5:24 China me log sabhi menial jobs, farming, handi jobs kyon karte hai ab logo ko pata chalega...jo log ye sab kar rahe hai china me voh bhi achchi life ji rahe hai(kamana aur spend karna), shayad yaha bhi aese hi hoga.
I m confused. Mere pahachan me kisi bhi software engineer ki job nahi gayi...

Ab india me coding introduce ki gayi hai , jab tak woh graduate honge it will be worthless skill
Right when India was about to use ut manpower to grow.. AI ne band baja di..

Ghanta koi job open nhi ho raha. Faltu ki batein hai ye. For the last 7 months I have been looking for a job. Hardly one or two calls come in a month. I am a senior java developer. Don't gaslight people.

Jab kitabon ke andar hi Premchand ke phate joote Surdas ka jhopada Babli Akbar ke yuddh ek Raja aaya dusra Raja Ko maar ke Chala Gaya aisi useless chijen padenge to Aisa hi hoga janab Hindustan ka education system sabse ghatiya gira hua Ganda Hai iske andar aapko vah chijen sikhai jaati Hai Jo aapke liye Life mein kahin use nahin aati

that's because of over population man. Now here the IT or corporate companies can't hire too many. They simply don't have to. They will hire only to fulfill their requirements. Ab population hi jada hai toh kya kar sakte hai

Zindagi se kuch expectations matt rakho bass krte jao you will start enjoying the life
